articleContent:
Event Period:

2024/2/19 - 2024/3/19 (PT) 


Entry Format:

Long-form Video/Short-form Video/Artwork


Reward Calculation Date:

March 19th, 2024 (PT)


Rules (Artwork)

♦ How To Participate

1. Follow our official X/Twitter or Instagram account.

2. Post your very own Wuthering Waves fan art with #WutheringWaves and #FanCreation hashtags on X/Twitter or Instagram.

3. After posting your work to the aforementioned platforms, submit your artwork file to our official link before the end of the event period for judges' review: https://forms.gle/dPDNe29HppZGiSLc6

4. Multiple entries are permitted. Only one prize can be won per participant.

5. Entries not posted and submitted to our official link within the event period will be considered invalid entries.

6. Winners will be decided by official event judges at Kuro Games.

♦ Participating Platforms

X/Twitter, Instagram

♦  Event Prizes

First Prize (1 Winner): 500 USD

Second Prize (2 Winners): 200 USD

Third Prize (5 Winners): 100 USD

Excellence Prize (10 Winners): Official Merchandise x1

※Winners for X/Twitter and Instagram platforms are awarded separately.

♦ Artwork Content

Original fan art related to Wuthering Waves.


Rules (Video)

♦ How To Participate

1. Follow our official YouTube or TikTok channel.

2. Post your very own Wuthering Waves video(s) on YouTube/TikTok with #WutheringWaves and #FanCreation hashtags

3. After posting your work to the aforementioned platforms, submit your multimedia file(s)/video(s) to our official link before the end of the event period for judges' review: https://forms.gle/dPDNe29HppZGiSLc6

4. Videos published on YouTube must be 61 seconds or longer in duration; There are no duration requirements for YouTube Shorts and TikTok videos. Entries must comply with the aforementioned criteria.

5. Multimedia file(s)/video(s) not posted and submitted to our official link within the event period will be considered invalid entries.

6. Winners will be decided by official event judges at Kuro Games.

♦ Participating Platforms

YouTube, TikTok

♦ Event Prizes

■ For long-form videos, TOP 3 videos with the most total views on YouTube by the end of the event period will receive cash rewards:

First Prize (1 Winner): 500 USD

Second Prize (3 Winners): 200 USD

Third Prize (5 Winners): 50 USD

■ For short-form videos, TOP 3 videos with the most likes on YouTube Shorts/TikTok by the end of the event period will receive cash rewards:

First Prize (1 Winner): 500 USD

Second Prize (3 Winners): 200 USD

Third Prize (5 Winners): 50 USD

※Winners for YouTube and TikTok platforms are awarded separately.

♦ Video Content

Game reviews, beta info, MMDs, walkthrough guides, music... Everything you can think of Wuthering Waves! Be it casual or hardcore, action-packed or emotional, it's all up to you to present the world of Wuthering Waves to your viewers.


♦ Kuro Games reserves the right of final interpretation for this event.
